  • Millions of Color Options: Select from 16 million colors and 1-100% dimmable brightness to make your space feel more vibrant. There are also tunable 2700k-6500k warm white to cool daylight options for reading or relaxing. *Not compatible with dimmer switches.
  • Light It Your Way: With Govee Home App, access up to 54 scene modes for your Wi-Fi recessed light bulbs. Music Mode lets your lights sync to the music. Set a timer to follow with your daily routine and use group control for all your Govee smart products.
  • Higher Brightness: Producing much brighter light vs common standard 60W LED bulbs, these 1200 lumens BR30 smart bulbs are ideal for large areas. Get higher brightness (85W equivalent) and vibrant colors (CRI90+) while saving on your energy bill.
  • Easy Smart Control: Easily utilize these RGBWW flood light bulbs with simple voice commands via Alexa or Google Assistant. Turn your smart light bulbs on/off, adjust brightness, change the colors, and set scenes via Govee Home App.
  • Flexible Connectivity: These smart color-changing bulbs support direct control via Wi-Fi and Bluetooth for more convenience. These connectivity options allow a more stable connection compared to bulbs that only support Wi-Fi or Bluetooth. Note: Doesn't support 5G.

    Customers say

    Customers love these light bulbs for their brightness, with white colors being particularly bright, and appreciate their functionality with Alexa and compatibility with other Govee lights. They are easy to set up and use, offer customizable colors for every occasion, and customers consider them a great investment. The app responsiveness and connectivity receive mixed reviews - while some find them super responsive, others say the app is cumbersome to use, and while some report zero issues with connectivity, others mention poor Wi-Fi connectivity.

      Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2025
      Item Package Quantity: 2
      Product works great and is easy to use. To save someone the same scare I received, be very careful when downloading the app. I have an iPhone and when searching the app store for "Govee Home", as per the instructions, the app you want isn't the first one that... See more
      Product works great and is easy to use. To save someone the same scare I received, be very careful when downloading the app. I have an iPhone and when searching the app store for "Govee Home", as per the instructions, the app you want isn't the first one that shows up. A different app shows up that matches the colors of the box. That app requires a subscription fee to use the online functions of the light. I was pretty disappointed as I wasn't about to pay a weekly/annual fee to change my light color. Then I noticed the Govee icon is a G with a dot on the left and figured out I needed the 2nd app that showed up under the search. Be careful as the light works just fine with correct app without a reoccurring fee.

      The only thing I wish was provided by this company was a bigger option for a bulb. We replaced our lamp lights with the smaller version and used these for our flood lights (right term, not sure?), and while they fill up the space better, they still sink in a little into our ceiling.
      Functionality-wise these are amazing!!!! They sync well and it's beautiful to be able to quickly and easily control my living room to be brighter or different colors. We do have a small apartment so they are all clustered pretty close. Occasionally the app may tell me to make sure I'm closer to the device (bulbs) if I'm standing off to the side in my kitchen, but that's not really a huge issue. You can group them room by room on the app or control them individually. After playing around with the app for just a little bit, we are really enjoying the features. Next we need to try the music syncing option!

      I am a Govee fan, I have many of their products and so when I wanted to replace my dimmable bulbs to these I was so excited, but unfortunately they did not work with my dimmer switch. Whenever I lowered the lighting it would cause the bulbs to flicker and buzz and sometimes change colour. Some colours were worse than others (some didn't blink as much, some blinked and buzzed faster) so I opted not to use them in that spot. Overall, the colour was rich, the lights got to a reasonable brightness and had they worked correctly for my dimmer switch I would have loved them but I wasn't about to fight with lights that didn't work so they are back to being a normal bulb (for now) in that spot.
